title: Hextech Crafting Champions
body:
Hi i would like to know a thing: if i reroll 3 champion shards do i get a random champion or 1 that i don't own?
Ty :)

replies.body: Re-rolling champion shards should prioritize champions that you don't own (as long as you don't currently own all champions).

When this launched (a while ago now) it was stated that you would be putting something in for people who have all champions.  I haven't since heard any mention of this, am I missing a post that you can direct me to? Or could I get some clarification?  What do you plan to change, when do you plan to change it, or at minimum when do you plan to tell us more?  I mean, it's rather obnoxious having 819 blue essence, and 10 more champion shards that I own with nothing to do with them.  And while on that topic of stuff that I have nothing to do with... I've also got 40,227 IP and heard you were looking into IP dumps, any eta on more info for that?

The current thing for that would be Champion Mastery levels 6 & 7 (out this patch).   Beyond the patch notes, you can check out the earlier posts we've made [here](http://boards.pbe.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/general-pbe-feedback/XT7eu7jz-champion-mastery-level-6-7) and [here](http://boards.pbe.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/general-pbe-feedback/uAFzxTpO-testing-champ-mastery-levels-6-and-7).

The first should be going over the context of ways for players with all champions to use champion essence whereas the second dives more into the pre-release details of Champ Mastery 6 & 7. 

As to more IP dumps in general, I have no idea to be honest :( It's a tricky area to solve for.  How do you find content/features that won't feel like a grind for players who don't have everything, but also still feel meaningful and not a cheap IP dump for players who do?  Hard question to answer and, in my opinion, one of the most difficult to execute well even with great ideas.
wait what if you own all champions
If you own all champions, it just gives a permenant champion shard of a champion you already own
